mapper.select: select count(*) from ( select t1.deliver_id,t1.deliver_code,t1.express_code,t1.express_date,t1.consignee_user_id,t1.consignee_date,t1.consignee_status, t2.order_code, t3.dealer_id,t3.dealer_name from dms.tb_deliver t1 inner join dms.tb_order t2 on t1.order_id = t2.id inner join dms.tb_dealer t3 on t1.dealer_id = t3.dealer_id where t1.consignee_status is not null ) t

select * from ( select t1.deliver_id,t1.deliver_code,t1.express_code,t1.express_date,t1.consignee_user_id,t1.consignee_date,t1.consignee_status, t2.order_code, t3.dealer_id,t3.dealer_name, (select sum(t4.express_num * t4.order_price * t4.discount) from dms.tb_deliver_express_detail t4 where t1.deliver_id = t4.deliver_id) as totalMoney from dms.tb_deliver t1 inner join dms.tb_order t2 on t1.order_id = t2.id inner join dms.tb_dealer t3 on t1.dealer_id = t3.dealer_id where t1.consignee_status is not null )t
limit #{offset},#{pagesize}
select * from dms.tb_deliver where consignee_status = 0 and deliver_code =#{deliver_code}
mapper.update: update dms.tb_deliver set consignee_user_id = #{consignee_user_id},consignee_date = NOW(),consignee_status = 1 where deliver_code =#{deliver_code}
